Reviews.Title: Needs Recalled
Reviews.Author: Kyle J. Karwatski
Reviews.Content: This is a PRODUCT REVIEW, not a SELLER REVIEW.This phone, Huawei Ascend II (M865c), should not be being sold to anyone.The model that works through Straight Talk has issues with network connectivity.Half of the people who purchase this phone experience these problems.When the phone is rebooted, the device fails to connect to the tower and is stuck in an inaccessible mode while the only thing displayed is a loading sign.This has been experienced by multiple of the same phone across multiple states. (They sent me replacements that all had the same issue)The program inside the phone is called com.huawei.android.keypadprogramming. This program crashes from the issue.---So, you may not experience these issues immediately, but after you reboot a few times, you will experience this.Straight Talk is aware of the issue. The deny being aware, however one of their employees (Vincent) informed me that it is well known with recent Huawei devices on the Sprint network (this phone operates on the Sprint network).The phone manufacturer is also aware of this but will not release a patch for the phone because the cost outweighs the benefits for them.---Regarding Straight Talk customer service... Please demand your money back if you have this issue. They (the managers on the support lines) have lied to me many times over the past few months and I have not receive a refund. Please do not be fooled by them. Ask for corporate.---Regarding these sellers on Amazon: This phone is not worth $140. You can buy it brand new from Straight Talk for $100... But, obviously, you don't want to do that.---I hope this helps you make a decision on your phone choice.

Reviews.Title: The Most Abysmal Piece of Crap EVER!
Reviews.Author: Lamarr Blocker

} } } Length:: 8:24 MinsThis is the review of the Huawei Ascend II:Pros:Unlimited $45 plan, I can talk until my battery goes flat or until I get blue in the face.Cons:Everything else about the bloody thing.Synopsis:I bought this phone on a whim, and I have got to say, even my old phone would love me more than this crap. I couldn't say to anyone, even my worst enemies to buy this phone; it is that bad. Upon start up, the phone needs to be restarted. One night, it took me 2 hours to actually be able to make a call. This phone is a death trap, like for real.Huawei (wa-way) is not getting annay (any) of my monay (money), hunnay (honey). If they think so, the devil is a liar.

Reviews.Title: Piece of s*** phone!!!
Reviews.Author: ChrisH
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone from Wal-mart sometime mid-year last year, 2012, thinking it was going to be a great phone for the price. I soon found out that this phone has a lot of problems. About 6 months after I had bought it, the phone started to force close and not restart when I power it off. I had to factory reset the phone and set it back up. It also started to force close the programs and even automatically close the programs without any warning whatsoever. About 1 month ago, maybe 2, I started having problems with the charger cable/port not charging the phone and had to replace the charging cable for it. All the while, all the other problems kept getting worse. Then just yesterday, the charger port stopped working all together and won't even charge now. I now have a phone that is completely useless to me. I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS PHONE TO ANYONE. IT IS A PIECE OF S***. I'm not even planning on having the phone replaced and just buy a completely new phone through a different provider. Save your money and put it toward a high end phone that will actually work. you will be doing yourself a favor in the long run.

Reviews.Title: junk
Reviews.Author: chris
Reviews.Content: Do not  buy this phone. It is very slow, has a poor memory capacity, and weak battery. It may be fair for calls only. Other than that totally useless device.

Reviews.Title: listen to the people who call it junk
Reviews.Author: David W. Francis "David Wayne"
Reviews.Content: I'm back after spending quite a bit of time with this phone. First I can say unless you just want to talk on this phone only then that is its only redeeming quality. That is absolutely horrible. For a prepaid phone this doesn't really have any features beside it being a touch screen. The Wi fi drains your battery to nothing in a matter of minutes. It flat out sucks. Also the processor its not the fastest even with a 4mb memory card. I do not like the fact that I have to reset this phone multiple times whenever there is a problem. Visiting my friend in Texas even hard resetting the phone didn't work. Even though Facebook has Android games this phone isn't compatible with most versions. Straight talk should reconsider their business model for releasing this useless heap of garbage to the market. YouTube usually won't play and when it does sucks the life our of your battery faster than you can blink. Of course if your fingers are too big you'll be cussing the phone more than recommending it. This is the worst phone I've ever had. I love the straight talk service but I think I'll be better off eve  I pay a little more and upgrade to Verizon. If you're going to use straight talk please stay away from this phone and don't waste your money.

Reviews.Title: Junk...
Reviews.Author: Danny
Reviews.Content: I have this phone currently as a emergency replacement..My s2 got crushed by a car..Anyway.. this is the worst phone i have ever owned , and should be pulled fromAmazon & the straighttalk line-up..Constantly have to pull the battery 4-5 times just to get the phone to turn on or boot up..Put the phone in your pocket and the cover comes off..i could go on and on about how crappy this phone is (but i wont,i will save your ears/eyes) ! It shouldnt even be allowed to cross american borders..More junk from china..Would not recomend this phone to anyone !!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: I would recommend this! Great Gift for grandparents and small children.  It was delivered in 2 days.
Reviews.Author: Tawanda Murphy Hill
Reviews.Content: It was just the right device for the purpose. 5 stars! Great value for your money and no hassles!  Wonderful!

Reviews.Title: Do not buy this phone ... no matter what!
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Burkepile
Reviews.Content: One star for catching me in this trap! I have had this phone for four days and have already had to reboot just to get service where another, far less expensive, straight talk phone was getting a great connection. Now, day four and my phone is stuck on emergency call. The biggest problem is there is no online tech support and the only call I need to make in this case is to straight talk! I am seriously disgusted! All the great reviews I have read and heard personally are quite obviously not relative to this phone. Which by the way as we speak is getting Facebook, gmail and missed call notifications! Four days in and I am seriously regretting this decision! Not good business straight talk, as if you care!

Reviews.Title: Waste of money!!
Reviews.Author: Jukes
Reviews.Content: I purchased 2 of these phones and they were great right away. Then they both quit working at basically the same time!! They both had a message for keyboard programming and the phone would freeze . I did further research on the Huawei and it's actually an extremely common problem!!! So do NOT waste your time and money!!

Reviews.Title: My Phone
Reviews.Author: Nina
Reviews.Content: Well, I see everyone has something bad to say about this phone, but I don't.  I have had my phone for almost three years and my phone have never done any of the things that everyone has claimed. I've downloaded a lot of apps and almost 3 hundred songs and a lot of pictures. My connection is great.

Reviews.Title: Huawei Ascend II
Reviews.Author: Daryl J. Healey "Daryl"
Reviews.Content: I would have given this phone ZERO stars, had that been an option.  I have had this phone for a year now, and all the while it has been unstable.  Being one to not give up so easily, I stuck it out and held on.  The first thing you will find is there is minimal internal memory, making it abysmally slow.  Then, you will find that not a lot of apps work with it,and those that do have a crippling effect on it.  Now, this piece of garbage won't even boot up without an error message that says: "com.android.huawei.keypadprogramming has stopped unexpectedly".  Cryptic enough?  I have been a Straighttalk customer for several years, and have had several of their phones.  This is the worst piece of garbage they carry - DO NOT BUY!!

Reviews.Title: Freezing up
Reviews.Author: Danigirl28
Reviews.Content: This brand of phones are horrible! The phones freeze all the time. Its a motherboard problem. Eventually the whole motherboard goes out. It also does not let all your texts come through, it deletes them before you can read them.

Reviews.Title: Sometimes I just want to throw it out a window.
Reviews.Author: Andrew Victor
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone from Walmart almost a year ago now. When I bought it the thing was great for the longest time. I didn't really need it for the games or the apps although the YouTube app is nice, but you'll go from full battery to none in like 45 mins while using that app. I purchased it for the ability to text and make phone calls. My phone held up great until I started having the "Keypad" programming issues. I've called customer support so many times I don't even care to try anymore. They've sent me replacement phones and what not but to no avail. Of late my main problem has been my text messaging as the keypad programming can be taken care of, if only for a limited time, by factory resetting the phone. No matter where I am whether I have full service or not, full 3g coverage. My phone will not send messages. Only after I resend the messages does it finally send to the person i'm trying to contact. Once again i've called customer support. They state there's connectivity issues in my area, really the capital city of Indiana is having connectivity issues for 3-5 days?! No one else within my friends group is having any issue out of their straight talk phones. So i'm assuming it's once again the phone having issues. I send roughly 7-9 thousand text messages a month so ultimately it's irritating, but If you're only looking for a phone to last you a few months it's great. DO NOT PURCHASE IF YOU'RE LOOKING FOR LONG TERM USE.

Reviews.Title: Really. Get something else!
Reviews.Author: Voss
Reviews.Content: All of the reviews on here are true. (unless they said something good) This phone is junk. Unless you like losing your contacts, not making calls, not getting on the internet, and your phone not working at all. If you are into those things, then this is the phone for you.

Reviews.Title: WORST PHONE EVER!
Reviews.Author: swartzegirl
Reviews.Content: I seriously cannot tell you just how much I hate this phone. I have had to do a factory reset every time I shut off my phone....total waste of money! This phone needs to be recalled.

Reviews.Title: Big Waste of Money
Reviews.Author: Dale R. Neumann
Reviews.Content: Bought 2 of these phones and subscribed to the prepaid $45/mo plan.  Phone freezes up on a regular basis with no easy solution to get it working.  In checking online posts, many, many people have this same problem, yet no solution is forthcoming.  Any e-mail to Straight Talk Customer Service is responded to with a message that you must call them.  Apparently, they don't give help via e-mail -- probably don't want anything in writing.  Also, there is limited coverage.  We discovered there is NO COVERAGE in a small town where we frequently visit relatives -- even though the Walmart site says that ZIP Code is covered by this phone.Again, don't waste your money.  Get a good phone and good service provider -- even if it means paying more.

Reviews.Title: This phone does not deserve a 1 star rating.
Reviews.Author: Kathy LeJeune "Kathy LeJeune"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone for my son and nothing but trouble. Can't connect to the internet. Memory full all the time. I even installed a 32gb sd card for storage. I did not read the reviews prior to buying this phone.I like Straight Talk Service, it is just this phone is junk.

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: amarch24
Reviews.Content: They sent a Samsung galaxy precedent instead. It has very small amount of memory and doesn't get signal good.I really don't like this phone

Reviews.Title: POS
Reviews.Author: Jennypoopoo
Reviews.Content: This phone is a piece of crap!! It has error screens anytime it dies and it can't retrieve any of my info now! It has terrible service, slow connectivity, all in all a terrible purchase. Do not waste your money!!

Reviews.Title: Not sure yet.
Reviews.Author: T. Jackson
Reviews.Content: Don't let the 5 stars fool ya....I haven't received these phones yet.  I just ordered 2 of them from walmarts website.  There are good reviews there and the phone was half price, even though they are still being sold in stores for full price which is $99.88.  Good reviews there, bad here...hopefully we will have good luck with ours.  Will update after we receive ours and try them out.Update:  found out this phone runs on sprint towers...don't want that, so getting refund at walmart and buying the Ascend Y instead of Ascend 2, which run on verizon towers.  You have to be careful about that.  Different straight talk phones are used on different towers so make sure you know which one is which.  Should say on the box, but if not sure...ask for help.

ProductInfo.Name: Huawei Ascend II Prepaid Cell Phone - Straight Talk
